GET MASTERED

FOR FREE

The DIY Mastering Blog is now accepting submissions!

Huh?


My name is Keenan, and I run a DIY mastering blog that teaches people how to Get Mastered without spending a dime!

The best way to teach is through hands on learning, so in every other post on Get Mastered, I like to master a song start to finish, and walk through the process. At the beginning of the post, I offer the unmastered song up for free download, so that readers can follow along and, hopefully, experiment on their own!
THIS IS WHERE YOU COME IN

I am currently looking for songs to use on the Get Mastered blog, which means you have an opportunity to get mastered by me totally on the free! I only ask permission for others to download your unmastered track.
This is a great opportunity for you to get a track mastered also get some free promotion from the blog!

Please do note: Due to the nature of the blog, I can only accept submissions that are of the highest quality, both from a technical and a performance perspective. Think your track is up to snuff? Read on for submission guidelines!

Reach out!

Use the form below to reach out to me and get your song featured on Get Mastered!
Please include a link to some of your music

I love to hear feedback from readers! If you have anything else you just HAVE to tell me, this for is the place for that too.
